name: 蕾拉 Layla
description:
“Layla” is a walking simulation and visual novel combined game about a story of memories of old times.

A journey back to the hometown
Come to Alaska in the 1950s, live here for a year and experience the landscape in all seasons.

A story of a family and a little bear
See how a bear and a family are connected by memories of the past.

And a beautiful old time
A gentle bedtime story, hope you can accompany the story, forget some unpleasant things and relax your mood.

“Layla” is my first game developed independently, I hope you can enjoy it.
Have a good day!
